smartgov.core.agent.core.behavior

Class Behavior<A extends AgentAction>

  • java.lang.Object
    • smartgov.core.agent.core.behavior.Behavior<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - AgentAction provided by this behavior.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MovingBehavior

    public abstract class Behavior<A extends AgentAction>
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class used to describe agent behaviors, providing actions from a specified AgentAction implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • getAgentBody

        public AgentBody<A> getAgentBody()

      • provideAction

        public abstract A provideAction()
        Provide the actions that an agent should perform according to the current conditions. This function is called at each tick to determine what action the AgentBody should perform. The function is then handled and executed by the AgentBody doAction function.
        Returns:
        an action to perform
